raw.title: [BIP-809] Enable YieldFi yUSD/USDC gauges on Balancer v3 Base deployment
raw.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1901

**Summary**:

This is a proposal to enable the root gauge https://etherscan.io/address/0x0D3F5D4022279c536a53aaa6bb8c225A0226d168 on Ethereum, [which redirects rewards to the child gauge https://basescan.org/address/0x7Ac2f85069470959f5960B6054479aD46dB4d818 on Base,] for the pool https://basescan.org/address/0x424d19d482a891b2c5cb881d651fbc32b349cb3c (surge yUSD/ waBasUSDC).

**References/Useful links**:

Link to:

• Website: https://yield.fi/

• Documentation: https://docs.yield.fi/

• Github Page: https://github.com/YieldFiLabs

• Twitter: https://x.com/getyieldfi

**Motivation**:

We have run incentives on our deployment of same pair on Arbitrum and saw the TVL grew to $700k+ in less than 2 months demonstrating demand for this liquidity pairing. As we have historically seen high demand on Base, compared to Arbitrum we are expanding this pair to base and by enabling gauge rewards, this pool will attract additional TVL, benefiting both protocols while creating one of the highest-yielding stable opportunities on Base.

https://dune.com/queries/4756760/7896201

This integration creates synergies between YieldFi, Balancer, and Aave, boosting activity across all three ecosystems.

**Protocol Description**:

yUSD is the yield bearing token by YieldFi deployed on Base and is backed by stablecoins like USDC/USDT/USR/wstUSR that strategically allocates assets across blue-chip DeFi protocols to generate 10-20% yields (currently 10.23% APY). The product features daily yield distribution, institutional-grade security, and full on-chain transparency.

waBasUSDC is the wrapped version of Aave's interest-bearing aBasUSDC on Base, which allows users to earn yield from USDC deposits in Aave.

**Specifications**:

Governance: YieldFi operates with a multi-sig wallet requiring 3/5 signatures from core team members

Oracles: https://docs.yield.fi/resources/oracles

Audits: https://docs.yield.fi/resources/audits

Centralization vectors: The primary centralization vectors include the multi-sig custody and professional team management of yield strategies (necessary for optimal returns)

Market History: yUSD has maintained perfect positive yieldcurve with no drawdown since launch with zero instances of depegging.

https://dune.com/queries/4785783/7937254

**Technical Specifications**:

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860 will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at 0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:

gauge(address):
0xGaugeAddress: [https://basescan.org/address/0x7Ac2f85069470959f5960B6054479aD46dB4d818
](https://basescan.org/address/0x7Ac2f85069470959f5960B6054479aD46dB4d818)0xRootGaugeAddress: https://etherscan.io/address/0x0D3F5D4022279c536a53aaa6bb8c225A0226d168

0xPoolAddress: https://basescan.org/address/0x424d19d482a891b2c5cb881d651fbc32b349cb3c

gaugeType(string): Base

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-747] Enable USDX/USDT and sUSDX/USDX gauge [Arbitrum]
raw.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1603

## Summary

This is a proposal to enable Balancer gauges on Arbitrum for USDX/USDT and sUSDX/USDX pools.

## References/Useful LInks

Link to:

* Website: https://usdx.money/

* Documentation: https://docs.usdx.money/

* Github Page: [USDX Token · GitHub](https://github.com/USDXToken)

* Communities: [X](https://x.com/usdx_money), [Telegram](https://t.me/USDX_Community), [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/usdxmoney)

## Protocol Description

* usdx.money is a stablecoin infrastructure project, with USDX as its first product.

* USDX is a synthetic stablecoin, designed to offer a stable, censorship-resistant, crypto-native money. USDX captures yield from crypto-native sources and distributes it back to its users.

* sUSDX is a staked version of USDX; yield for sUSDX currently stands around 19%.

* USDT is a fiat-backed USD-denominated stablecoin, issued by Tether.

## Motivation

* usdx.money has recently launched its points campaign, and expects the TVL to rapidly increase. With increased TVL, usdx.money is committed to building robust liquidity for sUSDX/USDX and USDX/USDT pairs on Arbitrum Chain to facilitate secondary liquidity for USDX and sUSDX. We are seeking to bootstrap majority of our liquidity on Balancer, and this will help onboard more users to both usdx.money and Balancer.

## Specification

1. **Governance**: currently owned by 0x3f9a06aD4c83c289DF83461fE5F24EE4c4491935 (3 out of 4 multisig).

2. **Oracles**: The protocol does not reply on external oracles.

3. **Audits**: [link](https://1166152427-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F5mdBNVoaU0Rn0IEZP0Y1%2Fuploads%2FAGLbaiVubfT1xuY1FdmH%2FBlocksec_Security_Audit_Report_for_USDX.pdf?alt=media&token=6326b906-c1b4-49cd-b670-666baee5d030). Additional audit reports can be viewed on https://docs.usdx.money/informaiton/audit

4. **Centralization vectors**: The centralization vectors primarily relate to the owner of the contracts, which is a 3 out of 4 multisig. The team has 15 full-time, doxxed contributors.

5. **Market history**: USDX has not previously de-pegged, and sUSDX is an ERC4626 token. Balancer pools for USDX/USDT and sUSDX/USDX have just been deployed.

* Addresses for USDX/USUSDT

  * Pool address: https://balancer.fi/pools/arbitrum/v2/0x85564af67760063b994599b640552614238c9ee60000000000000000000005e3

  * Arbitrum Child Gauge: https://arbiscan.io/address/0x7bbD2B8932610dEC2698C63fC28130224A339Df2#readContract

  * Mainnet Root Gauge: https://etherscan.io/address/0x5f244e8ac0FF2d2af14368fd8EFd1E508a50CF68
* Addresses for sUSDX/USDX

  * Pool address: https://balancer.fi/pools/arbitrum/v2/0xb3047330c1cb5eb1a3670fabfb99bdc106d631eb0000000000000000000005e4

  * Arbitrum Child Gauge: https://arbiscan.io/address/0x83bE87529aC31d06fEc49FF5Aedd6290b81D0700

  * Mainnet Root Gauge: https://etherscan.io/address/0x0d1b58fB1fC10F2160178DE1eAE2d520335ee372

6. **Value**: USDX currently has $210m in TVL, making it the th largest protocol by TVL on [BNB Chain](https://defillama.com/chain/BSC). As the protocol rolls out points program on Arbitrum, we intend for Balancer pools to be the primary source of liquidity for USDX and sUSDX on Arbitrum.

### Technical Specification
The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig `0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the addGauge function with the following arguments: gauge(address):`0x5f244e8ac0FF2d2af14368fd8EFd1E508a50CF68` gaugeType(string): `Arbitrum` gauge(address):`0x0d1b58fB1fC10F2160178DE1eAE2d520335ee372` gaugeType(string): `Arbitrum`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-782] Enable sUSDX/USDX/aUSDT gauge [Arbitrum]
raw.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1762

**Summary:**
This is a proposal to enable Balancer gauge on Arbitrum for sUSDX/USDX/aUSDT pool.


**References/Useful links:**

Link to:
* Website: https://usdx.money/
* Documentation: https://docs.usdx.money/
* Github Page: [USDX Token · GitHub](https://github.com/USDXToken)
* Communities: [X](https://x.com/usdx_money), [Telegram](https://t.me/USDX_Community), [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/usdxmoney)

**Protocol Description:**
* Stables Labs is a stablecoin infrastructure project, with USDX as its first product.
* USDX is a synthetic stablecoin, designed to offer a stable, censorship-resistant, crypto-native money. USDX captures yield from crypto-native sources and distributes it back to its users.
* sUSDX is a staked version of USDX; yield for sUSDX currently stands around 10%.
* USDT is a fiat-backed USD-denominated stablecoin, issued by Tether.

**Motivation:**

* Stables Labs has recently concluded Season 1 of its points campaign, and saw rapid increase in its TVL. Our previous collaboration with Balancer has proven extremely effective, as our sUSDX/USDX became Balancer v2 Arbitrum's biggest pool (TVL ~$10M). sUSDX/USDX/aUSDT Balancer v3 pool will allow users to enjoy greater yield, and deep pool of liquidity to swap through.

**Specifications:**
 
1. **Governance**: currently owned by 0x3f9a06aD4c83c289DF83461fE5F24EE4c4491935 (3 out of 4 multisig).
2. **Oracles**: The protocol does not reply on external oracles.
3. **Audits**: [link](https://1166152427-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F5mdBNVoaU0Rn0IEZP0Y1%2Fuploads%2FAGLbaiVubfT1xuY1FdmH%2FBlocksec_Security_Audit_Report_for_USDX.pdf?alt=media&token=6326b906-c1b4-49cd-b670-666baee5d030). Additional audit reports can be viewed on [Audit | usdx.money](https://docs.usdx.money/informaiton/audit)
4. **Centralization vectors**: The centralization vectors primarily relate to the owner of the contracts, which is a 3 out of 4 multisig. The team has 15 full-time, doxxed contributors.
5. **Market history**: USDX has not previously de-pegged, and sUSDX is an ERC4626 token. Balancer pools for USDX/USDT and sUSDX/USDX have just been deployed.
6. **Value**: USDX currently has $620M in TVL, making it the 4th largest protocol by TVL on [BNB Chain](https://defillama.com/chain/BSC), and 5th largest protocol by TVL on [Arbitrum](https://defillama.com/chain/Arbitrum). We will also be launching Season 2 of our points program soon, which would bring healthy amount of attention and activities around USDX.

sUSDX -USDX-aUSDT Pool https://balancer.fi/pools/arbitrum/v3/0xc2B0D1A1B4cdDA10185859B5a5c543024c2df869

Child Gauge [https://arbiscan.io/address/0x9419c8b7ff370db3823164acea6d9664f4b9c8a9](https://arbiscan.io/address/0x9419c8b7ff370db3823164acea6d9664f4b9c8a9)

Root Gauge [https://etherscan.io/address/0xeb312b0d7795743C3DE905bc09c0D62aA180A7a6](https://etherscan.io/address/0xeb312b0d7795743C3DE905bc09c0D62aA180A7a6)

## Technical Specifications:

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:`0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the `GaugeAdderv4` at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): [`0xeb312b0d7795743C3DE905bc09c0D62aA180A7a6`](https://etherscan.io/address/0xeb312b0d7795743C3DE905bc09c0D62aA180A7a6)

gaugeType(string): `Arbitrum`

Edits by Maxis:
1. modified child chain and root gauges
2. PR with Payload

choices: No, this is not the way

cleaned.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e

raw.title: [BIP-469] Enable BEETS/rETH gauge w/ 2% emission cap [Optimism]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/601


**Summary:**
> This is a proposal to enable BAL gauge for BEETS 80 / rETH 20 pool on optimism with 2% emission cap

**References/Useful links:**

> Link to:
    • Website https://op.beets.fi
    • Documentation https://docs.beets.fi/
    • Github Page https://github.com/beethovenxfi  
    • Twitter https://twitter.com/beethoven_x

**Protocol Description:**

> Beethoven X is a friendly fork of Balancer originated from Fantom back in 2021, and has been an essential part of the Balancer. It has been co-operating the Balancer deployment on optimism since 2022. $BEETS is the governance token of Beethoven X; on optimism, the token is bridged by Layerzero as a OFT. 

**Motivation:**

> This is to establish $BEETS liquidity on optimism. $BEETS token (the old multichain bridged version) has been used to incentivize liquidity through direct emission and voting incentives on optimism. The $BEETS token has recently been migrated to the Layerzero bridged version due to the multichain incidence (see [governance vote](https://snapshot.org/#/beets.eth/proposal/0xa3454614baec1abe0905d0abe6d1f08b53cae73879000dfcc8bd7c872419910c)). Hence, moving on the layerzero bridged version will be used. The pool will facilitate trading and holding of $BEETS on optimism. 

**Specifications:**
 
1. **Governance:** The BEETS governance is through maBEETS on fantom. 

2. **Oracles:** No

3. **Audits:** BeethovenX is a friendly fork of Balancer and has been [independently audited](https://docs.beets.fi/ecosystem/security). 

4. **Centralization vectors:** No

5. **Market History:** $BEETS token has a history for more than 2 years and is a well established token. 
 
6. **Value:** This pool will be the primary liquidity of $BEETS on optimism. The pairing with interest bearing $rETH would also earn protocol fees for Balancer. 


Pool address: https://op.beets.fi/pool/0xc1f46ce83439886f0ea9c21512b36e7e67239d2c000200000000000000000108

Child gauge: https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0x53bFf7a10181E4Fa2a92011dE9816220E0DaDd41

Root gauge: https://etherscan.io/address/0x20D03f9D0304744891881e6ac1D45b996e7F39B5#code

The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:`0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:
gauge(address):`0x20D03f9D0304744891881e6ac1D45b996e7F39B5`
gaugeType(string): `Optimism`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-580] Enable sfrxETH / cbETH pool [Base]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/884

## Summary:

* This is a proposal to enable a Balancer gauge for a sfrxETH/cbETH pool on Balancer on Base.
* This will be a core pool.
* The pool has been launched [here](https://app.balancer.fi/#/base/pool/0x98bedb6a3c0b6feebbe662e6419481a6877d9681000000000000000000000104)

## References/Useful links:

Link to:

• [Website](https://frax.finance/)

• [Documentation](https://docs.frax.finance/)

• [Github Page](https://github.com/FraxFinance/frax-solidity)


## Protocol Description:

sfrxETH is a staked interest bearing version of FRAX’s staked ETH (frxETH). Coinbase Wrapped Staked ETH (cbETH) represents your staked Ethereum (ETH) in a tradable form. You can unwrap cbETH at any time. cbETH provides flexibility to sell, transfer, or use it. You can move cbETH to a personal wallet and trade it outside the Coinbase platform.

## Motivation:

As a joint effort with FRAX, we aim to increase liquidity of FRAX, sFRAX, frxETH, sfrxETH, to make Balancer a liquidity hub for Frax assets on Base. The BAL gauge and core pool status will facilitate the process.

## Specifications:

* Governance: FRAX governance process can be seen [here](https://docs.frax.finance/smart-contracts/governance) and their snapshot [here](https://snapshot.org/#/frax.eth).
* Oracles: Chainlink feed for rate can be found [here](https://data.chain.link/feeds/base/base/sfrxETH-frxETH).
* Audits: See [here](https://docs.frax.finance/other/audits)
* Centralization vectors: see [here](https://docs.frax.finance/frax-ether/overview).
* Market History: See [here](https://docs.frax.finance/frax-ether/frxeth-and-sfrxeth)
* Value: Balancer will earn the protocol fee on interest bearing sfrxETH and cbETH in the pool and so will LPs. The BIP-19 flywheel will incentivize TVL to grow here with trading volume and our staked ethereum pillars will continue to have Balancer as their ideal liquidity destination.

Link to pool: https://app.balancer.fi/#/base/pool/0x98bedb6a3c0b6feebbe662e6419481a6877d9681000000000000000000000104

Link to child gauge: [0x1cadBEFEB5461a671CfAAf5faC237aF00baC0B1c](https://basescan.org/address/0x1cadBEFEB5461a671CfAAf5faC237aF00baC0B1c#code)

Link to root gauge: [0x3CFfb5d5Db1dA8AA58908e54C03a7f8a7edb233c](https://etherscan.io/address/0x3CFfb5d5Db1dA8AA58908e54C03a7f8a7edb233c)

## Technical Specification:

The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860 will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at 0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0x3CFfb5d5Db1dA8AA58908e54C03a7f8a7edb233c`

gaugeType(string): `Base`

choices: No, this is not the way

decision.summary: The proposal to enable YieldFi yUSD/USDC gauges on Balancer v3 Arbitrum is well-supported by early and stable voting power with unanimous backing. Forum sentiment is neutral, showing no opposition or strong support, aligning with the vote outcome. Similar past proposals passed but experienced post-vote price declines despite TVL growth, indicating cautious optimism is warranted.
key_arguments_for: Strong early and stable voting support with high voting power backing
Potential to attract additional TVL benefiting both YieldFi and Balancer protocols
Integration creates synergies between YieldFi, Balancer, and Aave ecosystems
YieldFi's yUSD token has a strong positive yield history with no depegging
key_arguments_against: Slight negative price impact observed in similar past proposals suggests some market caution
Centralization vectors include MPC custody and professional management which may pose risks

evidence.quote: Forum discussion shows neutral sentiment with 2 comments, no explicit opposition or support.
Timeline analysis indicates unanimous early and stable support for 'Yes, let's do it' option.
Balancer governance token address confirmed as 0xba100000625a3754423978a60c9317c58a424e3D.

available_choices: No, this is not the way
decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'Yes, let's do it' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
- The timeline metrics show unanimous, stable early support for the 'Yes, let's do it' option with strong voting power, indicating robust consensus.
- Forum sentiment is neutral with no opposition, aligning with the recommendation and suggesting the decision mirrors community views.
- Similar past proposals to enable gauges or grant permissions passed with strong support but saw negative token price impact post-vote, advising cautious optimism despite positive TVL growth.
- The proposal's integration with YieldFi and Aave is expected to attract TVL and create ecosystem synergies, supporting the long-term health of the protocol.
